welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shepshed, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with 30 minutes of free access provided per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
